extendedInfo.description: "Moe Moe Block8" is a kind of "Breakout" game which is bouncing a ball and destroying clothes(like block) on girl.When energy gauge is charged on 100%, you can attack blocks by laser in this version!A ball travels across the screen, bouncing off the top and side blocks. When a block is hit, the ball bounces away and the block is destroyed. The player loses a turn when the ball touches the bottom of the screen. To prevent this from happening, the player has a movable paddle to bounce the ball upward, keeping it in play.You get some points by playing game, and you can play new stage by using the points.If you want to play new stage as soon as possible, you should take advantage of shopping wisely!There are some items which take advantage to the game.-add extra ball-make the ball penetrate the block-make paddle larger-make paddle smaller-make the barrier behind the paddle-make the ball blinking-speed up the ball-speed down the ball-make clothes semi transparency-zoom up the girlWhen you destroy all blocks, you see a clear graphic of girl behind the blocks.This game has international and domestic ranking. Can you put your name on the leaderboard also?

reviews.title: Porn
reviews.comment: I dont know how to play the game
reviews.author: razif sairan

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: Same fun game but incredibly buggy. Ball sometimes goes through paddle laser attack rarely works and game crashes a lot.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: 5 star!
reviews.comment: Amazingly entertaining. I play all the time! I love the art but, I wish there was more MOE. We need characters with flatter chests and nekomimi/cat girls would be nice xD
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: The \'attack\' button is a good idea, but it doesnt always work. Id still like to have a pause feature too.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great but to many pop up adds
reviews.comment: Pop up adds come up in middle of game and freeze it or make ball glitchy other than the adds a great game
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Wow really?
reviews.comment: This game has a lot of bugs, I can\'t even see the ball or the start button, I have to touch the screen randomly!uninstalling...
reviews.author: luis toribio

reviews.title: Okay,
reviews.comment: But please add save picture option in gallery.
